snippet: In ways large and small, the State of Florida v. George Zimmerman is serving as a modernized blueprint for deploying social media in a murder case.
abstract: State of Florida v George Zimmerman, in ways large and small, is serving as a modernized blueprint for deploying social media in the high-profile Florida murder case of Trayvon Martin; defense lawyer Mark O'Mara has used social media and Internet to defend Martin; criminal lawyers are getting crash courses on how best to use social media to help their clients.
lead_paragraph: In ways large and small, the State of Florida v. George Zimmerman is serving as a modernized blueprint for deploying social media in a murder case.

headline.seo: Social Media Finds a Role in Case Against Zimmerman
headline.main: Social Media, Growing in Legal Circles, Find a Role in Florida Murder Case
headline.print_headline: Social Media, Growing in Legal Circles, Find a Role in Florida Murder Case
